QuestData.Title: WANTED: Hilaani
QuestData.Description: O'riley wants to thank our peasants for their hard work with a riverbeast dinner.$B$I don't want to waste your time asking you to slaughter the things all day, commander. We've gotten reports of a huge riverbeast called Hilaani that would feed the whole fort twice over living in the lake to the south.$B$BIf you have a chance to bring cuts of her meat back, the men would be grateful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Hilaani and bring the Pile of Riverbeast Meat to Patrick Messer.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you had time to kill Hilaani?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, commander! The peasants will be singing songs about your generosity tomorrow.
